Module kivakit.core.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.messaging.listeners

Class ThrowingListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.messaging.listeners.ThrowingListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Receiver<Transmittable>, NamedObject, Listener, Transceiver
    public class ThrowingListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements Listener
    Listens to Messages of a given type. All problems are logged. All failure messages result in an exception being thrown. All other messages are ignored.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
